Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump Temporary Reroute near Jeffery/73rd
ShortDescription: J14 Jeffery Jump buses are rerouted in both directions: due to street blockage near Jeffery/73rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions: 

Northbound via Jeffery, 73rd, Yates, 71st, Jeffery, and resume normal route.
Southbound via Jeffery, 67th, Stony Island, 73rd, Jeffery and resume normal route due to street blockage near Jeffery/73rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park- Bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park- Bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier signal problems at Rosemont. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park- Bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier signal problems at Rosemont. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
